comments.body: silent fail if privilege not held?

Yep, `Get-AnsiblePrivilege` can return 3 values

* `$null`: the token doesn't have the privilege
* `$false`: the privilege is disabled
* `$true`: the privilege is enabled

It seems like the `SeBackupPrivilege` is only needed for creating symlinks while someone may use this to get info on a link from win_stat. I'm going to investigate further where exactly this privilege is needed but for now this is just a try and enable if possible.
